title: Generate initial migration
description: Generate the initial Alembic migration using `alembic revision --autogenerate -m 'initial schema'`. Verify migration creates: all enums, all tables with correct columns and types, all foreign keys with cascade, all indexes (GIN on search_vector, HNSW on embedding, composite indexes), pgvector extension. Review generated migration for correctness.
acceptance_criteria:
- Migration file created in migrations/versions/
- Migration includes CREATE EXTENSION pgvector
- All 11 tables created (users, refresh_tokens, user_skills, skills, projects, project_collaborators, tribes, tribe_members, tribe_open_roles, feed_events)
- All enums created
- All indexes present
- Foreign keys with CASCADE
- Migration runs without errors
